DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate the efficacy of trans-cranial magnetic stimulation in treating attention deficit disorder in adults.
DOC.brief_title: Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy of the HLPFC Coil Deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation System in Treating Attention Deficit and Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) in Adults
DOC.criteria: 1865 years ADD/ADHD any DSMIV psychiatric disorder except ADD/ADHD use of psychoactive medications Epilepsy brain injury
